headline: Tracking Christopher Davis' Davis Selected Advisers 13F Portfolio - Q3 2024 Update
summary: Davis Selected Advisers' 13F portfolio hits $17.83B in Q3 2024, with new stakes in Trip.com and significant increases in MGM Resorts and Viatris. Read more here.

headline: US lawmakers press top chip equipment makers for details on China sales
summary: China hardliners in Congress are calling on the world's foremost semiconductor equipment makers - KLA, LAM, Applied Materials, Tokyo Electron and ASML - to provide details of their sales to China. ...

headline: Applied Materials (AMAT) Declined Due To a General Pullback By Investors
